analysis.description:
AdvanceCrowdsale._getTokenAmount (/unique_chucks/39/0xfc3f49e53fe76ab97dee93a53fe78f1a61d2a35a.sol#266-284) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- AdvanceCrowdsale.usdPerEth
	- AdvanceCrowdsale.tokenPerEth

token (/unique_chucks/39/0xfc3f49e53fe76ab97dee93a53fe78f1a61d2a35a.sol#62-67) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/39/0xfc3f49e53fe76ab97dee93a53fe78f1a61d2a35a.sol#63)

Reentrancy in AdvanceCrowdsale._getTokenAmount (/unique_chucks/39/0xfc3f49e53fe76ab97dee93a53fe78f1a61d2a35a.sol#266-284):
	External calls:
	- usd = ctrtMarketPrice.getUSDEth() (/unique_chucks/39/0xfc3f49e53fe76ab97dee93a53fe78f1a61d2a35a.sol#272-273)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokenPerEth (/unique_chucks/39/0xfc3f49e53fe76ab97dee93a53fe78f1a61d2a35a.sol#276)
	- usdPerEth (/unique_chucks/39/0xfc3f49e53fe76ab97dee93a53fe78f1a61d2a35a.sol#276)
Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/39/0xfc3f49e53fe76ab97dee93a53fe78f1a61d2a35a.sol#54-62) should be declared external
AdvanceCrowdsale.init (/unique_chucks/39/0xfc3f49e53fe76ab97dee93a53fe78f1a61d2a35a.sol#173-184) should be declared external
AdvanceCrowdsale.setFunding (/unique_chucks/39/0xfc3f49e53fe76ab97dee93a53fe78f1a61d2a35a.sol#185-204) should be declared external
AdvanceCrowdsale.setMarket (/unique_chucks/39/0xfc3f49e53fe76ab97dee93a53fe78f1a61d2a35a.sol#247-250) should be declared external

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/39/0xfc3f49e53fe76ab97dee93a53fe78f1a61d2a35a.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/39/0xfc3f49e53fe76ab97dee93a53fe78f1a61d2a35a.sol#1): it allows old versions
